Parameter.name: ApiVersion
Parameter.description: The version tag of the API used in the URL.

Parameter.name: serviceRootUrl
Parameter.description: The base URL of the SensorThings Server without version.

Parameter.name: defaultCount
Parameter.description: The default value for the $count query option.

Parameter.name: defaultTop
Parameter.description: The default value for the $top query option.

Parameter.name: maxTop
Parameter.description: The maximum allowed value for the $top query option.

Parameter.name: maxDataSize
Parameter.description: The maximum allowed estimated data size (in bytes) for responses.

Parameter.name: useAbsoluteNavigationLinks
Parameter.description: If true, navigationLinks are absolute, otherwise relative.

Parameter.name: enableActuation
Parameter.description: If true, actuation entities are exposed.

Parameter.name: enableMultiDatastream
Parameter.description: If true, MultiDatastream entities are exposed.

Parameter.name: http.cors.enable
Parameter.description: If true, a filter is added that allows cross-origin requests.

Parameter.name: auth.provider
Parameter.description: The java class used to configure authentication/authorisation.

Parameter.name: auth.allowAnonymousRead
Parameter.description: If true, anonymous users are allowed to read (GET) data.

Parameter.name: auth.role.read
Parameter.description: The name of the role to use for 'read' access.

Parameter.name: auth.role.create
Parameter.description: The name of the role to use for 'create' access.

Parameter.name: auth.role.update
Parameter.description: The name of the role to use for 'update' access.

Parameter.name: auth.role.delete
Parameter.description: The name of the role to use for 'delete' access.

Parameter.name: auth.role.admin
Parameter.description: The name of the role to use for 'admin' access.

Parameter.name: bus.busImplementationClass
Parameter.description: The java class used for connecting to the message bus.

Parameter.name: bus.mqttBroker
Parameter.description: The MQTT broker to use as message bus

Parameter.name: persistence.persistenceManagerImplementationClass
Parameter.description: The java class used for persistence (must implement PersistenceManaher interface)

Parameter.name: persistence.idGenerationMode
Parameter.description: Mode for id generation when using PostgresPersistenceManagerString.

Parameter.name: persistence.autoUpdateDatabase
Parameter.description: Automatically apply database updates.

Parameter.name: persistence.alwaysOrderbyId
Parameter.description: Always add an 'orderby=id asc' to queries to ensure consistent paging.

Parameter.name: persistence.db_jndi_datasource
Parameter.description: JNDI data source name
